title: LoL client update stuck at 74%
body: My LoL client is updating for four hours now, and everytime I try to install it on my new Macbook it doesn't work, it allways gets stuck at 74%. I have allready shut down my firewall and tried every other option but nothing seems to work to resolve this issue. I am thinking about returning this Macbook for this reason. I hope any of you can help me out real quick.

replies.body: Hey there, getting stuck this far out usually indicates an unstable connection that's struggling to download updates.  Go over the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help clear up any blocks and instability to fix this up!
